Biden: s comments during the 2009 swine flu outbreak: Biden advised against traveling in confined places and stated that when one person sneezes, it spreads throughout an aircraft. This statement was deemed unsupported by science by experts.
Backlash and clarification: Biden's comments received backlash, leading his spokesperson to issue a clarification regarding his statement.
Lack of formal apology from the Obama ad: Contrary to the claim, the Obama administration did not issue a formal apology regarding Biden's comments during the swine flu outbreak.
Trump: s use of the swine flu outbreak to criticize Biden: President Donald Trump has used the swine flu outbreak as a point of criticism against Biden, suggesting that Biden's handling of the situation was inept. However, this claim has been fact-checked and found to be misleading.
